home.heroSubtitle: Discover the humanity and journeys in our neighborhood.

home.shareDescription: Every story matters‚Äîwhether you're a longtime San Franciscan or just moved here for work. Share your journey, a moment of kindness on Muni, or how you became the best version of yourself in this beautiful, challenging city.

shareDialog.title: Share Your Story
shareDialog.promptDescription: These prompts can help inspire your story, but feel free to share anything meaningful to you.
shareDialog.familyJourney: A story about your family's journey
shareDialog.familyDescription: How your family came to this neighborhood or a meaningful tradition.
shareDialog.friendshipDescription: How you met your best friend or an unexpected connection.
shareDialog.bestSelf: A story about your best self
shareDialog.bestSelfDescription: A moment when you helped someone or overcame a challenge.
shareDialog.storyDescription: Share your story here. What happened? How did it make you feel? What did you learn?
shareDialog.storyPlaceholder: Take your time and share what feels meaningful to you...
shareDialog.storyHelp: Take your time. Authentic stories, however long or short, create the deepest connections.
shareDialog.languageQuestion: What language will you share your story in?
shareDialog.languageDescription: Choose the language you're most comfortable telling your story in.
shareDialog.translatorHelp: This helps neighbors who speak other languages know they can still connect with your story.
shareDialog.translatorLanguage: What language can you translate to/from?
shareDialog.howKnown: How would you like to be known?
shareDialog.howKnownDescription: This is what will display on your story's card.
shareDialog.namePlaceholder: e.g., Maria S., David from Oak Street
shareDialog.anonymous: Share completely anonymously (no contact from neighbors)
shareDialog.notifications: Yes, notify me when neighbors want to hear more of my story

interestDialog.title: Join the Story Circle
interestDialog.step1: We'll notify the {isMultiple, select, true {authors} other {author}} that you're interested in hearing {isMultiple, select, true {their stories} other {their full story}}.
interestDialog.step2: When 2-3 neighbors express interest, {isMultiple, select, true {authors} other {the author}} can choose to organize a meetup.
interestDialog.step3: Meet at a local SF coffee shop or library to hear the {isMultiple, select, true {stories} other {full story}} and connect.
interestDialog.notificationMethod: How would you like to be notified?
interestDialog.emailDescription: We'll only use this to notify you about {isMultiple, select, true {these stories} other {this story}}
interestDialog.phoneDescription: We'll only use this to text you about {isMultiple, select, true {these stories} other {this story}}

Your contact information is only shared if {isMultiple, select, true {an author} other {the author}} decides to organize a meetup and you both agree to connect.
